title: Case by ID
description: Lookup a single case by its numeric or string ID.

title: Count in window
description: Total cases in a time window, optional filters for department/reason/type/status.
examples: count open sanitation requests this month

title: Top-N neighborhoods
description: Top neighborhoods by total cases over the last N weeks.
examples: which areas had most calls this month

title: Weekly trend by neighborhood
description: Weekly case counts by neighborhood for recent weeks.
examples: how did neighborhoods change over time

title: Weekly trend by department
description: Weekly case counts by department for recent weeks.

title: Avg days to close (dept)
description: Average time to close by department over the last N days.
examples: average days to close by department last 90 days

title: Backlog older than X
description: Open cases older than a threshold (days).

title: Cases inside neighborhood
description: Cases within a canonical neighborhood polygon in a time window.
examples: issues in BRIGHTON last 30 days limit 50
show south boston cases this month

title: Within radius of point
description: Cases within a radius (meters) of a lon/lat point in a time window.

title: Keyword search
description: Free text search against case_title/location within a time window.

title: Data freshness
description: When the table was last ingested.
